name: FreeCam
description:
Use F6 to toggle FreeCam, or change key bind in the settings.

You can control mod settings from in-game chat:
.freecam - displays current settings
.freecam speed 100 - set maximum speed, blocks/second (default 50)
.freecam acc 100 - set acceleration, blocks/second^2 (default 50)
.freecam slow 0.001 - set slowdown speed when you release all buttons. Every second speed is multiplied by this value (default 0.01)
.freecam hands 1 - show hands while in freecam (default 0)
.freecam target 0 - disable custom targeting in freecam (default 1)
